verses.roman:
amogha marena--śuni' kahe bhaṭṭācārya
sahāya ha-iyā daiva kaila mora kārya

synonyms: amogha marena—Amogha is dying; śuni'-hearing; kahe bhaṭṭācārya—Bhaṭṭācārya said; sahāya ha-iyā—helping; daiva—Providence; kaila—did; mora—my; kārya—duty.
translation: When Bhaṭṭācārya heard that Amogha was dying of cholera, he thought,"It is the favor of Providence that He is doing what I want to do.
